aboutText1: This free directory helps New Yorkers find sexual health services including STI testing, HIV testing, PrEP, contraception, abortion care, and gender-affirming care.
aboutText2: Built by volunteers. Not affiliated with any clinic or healthcare organization.
aboutDisclaimer: This directory is for informational purposes only. We are not a healthcare provider. Always verify information directly with clinics before visiting.
privacyIntro: Your privacy matters. This site is designed to collect as little data as possible.
privacyNoAccounts: No accounts or personal data collected
privacyAnalytics: Privacy-focused analytics (GoatCounter) - no cookies, no tracking across sites
privacyLanguage: Language preference stored locally in your browser only
privacyMaps: Maps provided by Mapbox (their privacy policy applies to map usage)
privacyCorrections: Correction submissions are emailed to maintainers, then deleted
privacyNoCookies: We do not use advertising cookies or sell any data.
